Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: split. - intros H eps Heps. specialize (H (eps / 2) (Rlt_div_r 0 eps 2 (Rlt_R0_R2 Heps))). destruct H as [N H]. exists N. intros n y Hn Hy. assert (A := Hy). specialize (H n y Hn A). unfold Lim_seq. rewrite <- Rbar_div_pos_correct by apply Rlt_R0_R2. rewrite <- H. unfold Rbar_min. rewrite Rbar_plus_correct. rewrite <- LimInf_eq_LimSup_eq.correct. intros y0. rewrite <- LimInf_spec. rewrite <- LimSup_spec. auto. - intros H eps Heps. specialize (H eps Heps). unfold CVU_dom. exists (fun n : nat => (eps)/2). exists (Rabs (f y - Lim_seq (fun n0 : nat => fn n0 y)) < (eps)/2). split. + unfold Lim_seq.
